briefdescription.para: Function to retrieve current gravitational parameter of central body.
Function to retrieve current state of body exerting acceleration.
Function to retrieve current state of body undergoing acceleration.
Boolean denoting whether the gravitational attraction of the central body on the accelerated body is included.
Current state of the body undergoing the acceleration (as set by update function).
Current state of the body exerting the acceleration (as set by update function).
Current gravitational parameetr of the body exerting the acceleration (as set by update function).
Current partial of central gravity acceleration w.r.t. position of body undergoing acceleration.

detaileddescription.para: Current partial of central gravity acceleration w.r.t. position of body undergoing acceleration ( = -partial of central gravity acceleration w.r.t. position of body exerting acceleration), calculated and set by update( ) function.

briefdescription.para: Function to update the gravitational acceleration model.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::shared_ptr< gravitation::CentralGravitationalAccelerationModel3d > gravitationalAcceleration, const std::string acceleratedBody, const std::string acceleratingBody)
memberdef.name: CentralGravitationPartial

detaileddescription.para:
Default constructor.
gravitationalAcceleration
Central gravitational acceleration w.r.t. which partials are to be taken.
acceleratedBody
Body undergoing acceleration.
acceleratingBody
Body exerting acceleration.

memberdef.argsstring: (Eigen::Block< Eigen::MatrixXd > partialMatrix, const bool addContribution=1, const int startRow=0, const int startColumn=0)
memberdef.name: wrtPositionOfAcceleratedBody

briefdescription.para: Function for calculating the partial of the acceleration w.r.t. the position of body undergoing acceleration..

detaileddescription.para:
Function for calculating the partial of the acceleration w.r.t. the position of body undergoing acceleration and adding it to the existing partial block Update( ) function must have been called during current time step before calling this function.
partialMatrix
Block of partial derivatives of acceleration w.r.t. Cartesian position of body undergoing acceleration where current partial is to be added.
addContribution
Variable denoting whether to return the partial itself (true) or the negative partial (false).
startRow
First row in partialMatrix block where the computed partial is to be added.
startColumn
First column in partialMatrix block where the computed partial is to be added.

memberdef.argsstring: (Eigen::Block< Eigen::MatrixXd > partialMatrix, const bool addContribution=1, const int startRow=0, const int startColumn=0)
memberdef.name: wrtPositionOfAcceleratingBody

briefdescription.para: Function for calculating the partial of the acceleration w.r.t. the position of body undergoing acceleration..

detaileddescription.para:
Function for calculating the partial of the acceleration w.r.t. the position of body undergoing acceleration and adding it to the existing partial block. The update( ) function must have been called during current time step before calling this function.
partialMatrix
Block of partial derivatives of acceleration w.r.t. Cartesian position of body exerting acceleration where current partial is to be added.
addContribution
Variable denoting whether to return the partial itself (true) or the negative partial (false).
startRow
First row in partialMatrix block where the computed partial is to be added.
startColumn
First column in partialMatrix block where the computed partial is to be added.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::pair< std::string, std::string > &stateReferencePoint, const propagators::IntegratedStateType integratedStateType)
memberdef.name: isStateDerivativeDependentOnIntegratedAdditionalStateTypes

briefdescription.para: Function for determining if the acceleration is dependent on a non-translational integrated state.

detaileddescription.para:
Function for determining if the acceleration is dependent on a non-translational integrated state. No dependency is implemented, but a warning is provided if partial w.r.t. mass of body exerting acceleration (and undergoing acceleration if mutual attraction is used) is requested.
stateReferencePoint
Reference point id of propagated state
integratedStateType
Type of propagated state for which dependency is to be determined.
True if dependency exists (non-zero partial), false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting up and retrieving a function returning a partial w.r.t. a double parameter.

detaileddescription.para:
Function for setting up and retrieving a function returning a partial w.r.t. a double parameter. Function returns empty function and zero size indicator for parameters with no dependency for current acceleration.
parameter
Parameter w.r.t. which partial is to be taken.
Pair of parameter partial function and number of columns in partial (0 for no dependency, 1 otherwise).

briefdescription.para: Function for setting up and retrieving a function returning a partial w.r.t. a vector parameter.

detaileddescription.para:
Function for setting up and retrieving a function returning a partial w.r.t. a vector parameter. Function returns empty function and zero size indicator for parameters with no dependency for current acceleration.
parameter
Parameter w.r.t. which partial is to be taken.
Pair of parameter partial function and number of columns in partial (0 for no dependency).

briefdescription.para: Function for updating partial w.r.t. the bodies' positions.

detaileddescription.para:
Function for updating common blocks of partial to current state. For the central gravitational acceleration, position partial is computed and set.
currentTime
Time at which partials are to be calculated

briefdescription.para: Function to create a function returning the current partial w.r.t. a gravitational parameter.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to create a function returning the current partial w.r.t. a gravitational parameter.
parameterId
Identifier of parameter for which the partial is to be created.
Pair with partial function and paramater partial size. The partial function is non-empty only if the parameterId input represents the gravitational parameter of acceleratingBody_ (or acceleratedBody_ if accelerationUsesMutualAttraction_ is true).

briefdescription.para: Function to calculate central gravity partial w.r.t. central body gravitational parameter.
Class to calculate the partials of the central gravitational acceleration w.r.t. parameters and states.
